pPivotSettings Class Reference
[RigidBody]

Class to describe a pivot offset. More...

List of all members.

Public Attributes

  • VxVector localPosition
    Local position offset. The local position of can be changed by pRigidBody::setPosition

    • Range: [vector)
    • Default: (0,0,0).

  • VxVector localOrientation
    Local orientation offset. The local orientation of can be changed by pRigidBody::setRotation

    • Range: [0,inf)
    • Default: (0,0,0).

  • CK_ID pivotReference
    Reference object to determine the shape local matrix. The members "Linear" and "Angular" are being used to transform the final matrix.

    • Range: [object)
    • Default: 0.

Detailed Description

Class to describe a pivot offset.
